lead_paragraph: Family and friends bid farewell on Sunday to Joan Rivers, the outspoken comedian who became famous around the world for her acerbic wit and brash style, at a private funeral sprinkled with jokes, laughter and songs.

headline.main: Family, Friends Remember Joan Rivers in Poignant, Funny Funeral
headline.print_headline: Family, Friends Remember Joan Rivers in Poignant, Funny Funeral

snippet: Family and friends bid farewell on Sunday to Joan Rivers, the outspoken comedian who became famous around the world for her acerbic wit and brash style, at a private funeral sprinkled with jokes, laughter and songs....
